info.description: Data around written questions and answers, as well as written ministerial statements.
info.title: Written Questions Service API

parameters.description: Daily report with report date on or after the date specified. Date format yyyy-mm-dd
parameters.name: dateFrom

schema.description: Daily report with report date on or after the date specified. Date format yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.description: Daily report with report date on or before the date specified. Date format yyyy-mm-dd
parameters.name: dateTo

schema.description: Daily report with report date on or before the date specified. Date format yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.description: Daily report relating to the House specified. Defaults to Bicameral
parameters.name: house

parameters.description: Number of records to skip, default is 0
parameters.name: skip

schema.description: Number of records to skip, default is 0

parameters.description: Number of records to take, default is 20
parameters.name: take

schema.description: Number of records to take, default is 20

get.summary: Returns a list of daily reports
